snippet.title: Solace State Story x Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Solace State is an intimate choice-driven cyberpunk game about a young hacker, Chloe, who comes to her political awakening as she seeks out her friends in a sci-fi surveillance society. Your choices in immersive conversations, the kindling of relationships, and escalating tensions lead to multiple endings. Change the personal, revolutionize the political. Coming soon to PC and an unannounced console. 

The choices you make influence NPCs' perception, not only of your character, but also their perspectives on themselves and on society.

If you're seeing this during 2020 Sept 12-21, we are part of 3 (!!!) curated expos! 
1) @EGX Leftfield Collection: Sept 12-20
2) @GDoCExpo & Gradient Convergence: Sept 18-21 
3) @PAX Beyond 101 Representation panel: Sept 20

We're livestreaming 7 days during the expos - go to our Steam page to find our schedules and watch! https://bit.ly/solacestatesteam

❀ Wishlist on Steam: https://bit.ly/solacestatesteam
❀ Subscribe to our newsletter: https://www.solacestategame.com/
❀ Twitter: https://twitter.com/SolaceStateGame
❀ Chat with us & learn about the city’s factions! https://discord.gg/tU8JVQj
❀ Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/vividfoundry
